role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that configures disks and partitions
role_description_full_overview: If you know in advance the IDs of your various hard disks then you can use this role to customize their mounting point and labels, for instance.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that configures disks and partitions.
